snippet: Former Attorney General Michael J. Bowers, who once defended Georgia’s anti-sodomy law, is lobbying against a measure he says would be used to justify discrimination.
abstract: Former Georgia Atty Gen Michael J Bowers, who defended state's anti-sodomy law in 1980s, is now lobbying on behalf of gay rights group Georgia Equality; he is fighting proposed legislation that he says would be used to justify discrimination; acknowledges that his opinions on gay rights have changed over the years.
lead_paragraph: Former Attorney General Michael J. Bowers, who once defended Georgia’s anti-sodomy law, is lobbying against a measure he says would be used to justify discrimination.
